price: شۇ كۈندە ئاللاھ ئۇلارغا تولۇق تېگىشلىك جازاسىنى بېرىدۇ، ئۇلار ئاللاھنىڭ ئاشكارا ھەق ئىكەنلىكىنى بىلىدۇ[25].
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يُوَفِّيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ دِينَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yuwaffīhimu al-lahu dīnahumu al-ḥaqa wayaʿlamūna anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu al-mubīnu
translations: Allah will pay them in full
Allah will pay them in full
